languages.text: "Cтычки с врагами Человечества для жителей местных систем не такая уж и редкость. Однако в последнее время проклятые твари словно с цепи сорвались. Мы получаем сведения с кораблей, которым удалось прорваться сквозь варп к Даргонусу — нападениям подвергаются и они, и колонии, с которых суда держали путь к столице. Мы идентифицировали род ксеносов, представляющих угрозу — это {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, древние и коварные враги Человечества. Будьте бдительны в перелетах — ксеносы без сомнений нападут на судно Вольного Торговца, если сочтут обстоятельства выгодными для себя".

traits.locale_text: "Cтычки с врагами Человечества для жителей местных систем не такая уж и редкость. Однако в последнее время проклятые твари словно с цепи сорвались. Мы получаем сведения с кораблей, которым удалось прорваться сквозь варп к Даргонусу — нападениям подвергаются и они, и колонии, с которых суда держали путь к столице. Мы идентифицировали род ксеносов, представляющих угрозу — это эльдары, древние и коварные враги Человечества. Будьте бдительны в перелетах — ксеносы без сомнений нападут на судно Вольного Торговца, если сочтут обстоятельства выгодными для себя".

languages.text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."
languages.original_text: "Cтычки с врагами Человечества для жителей местных систем не такая уж и редкость. Однако в последнее время проклятые твари словно с цепи сорвались. Мы получаем сведения с кораблей, которым удалось прорваться сквозь варп к Даргонусу — нападениям подвергаются и они, и колонии, с которых суда держали путь к столице. Мы идентифицировали род ксеносов, представляющих угрозу — это {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}друкари{/g}, древние и коварные враги Человечества. Будьте бдительны в перелетах — ксеносы без сомнений нападут на судно Вольного Торговца, если сочтут обстоятельства выгодными для себя".

traits.locale_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from the ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We've identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the Aeldari, humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your flights — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favor."

"The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We've identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the Aeldari, humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your flights — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favor."

We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the Aeldari, humanity's ancient and insidious foes. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

languages.text: “这个星系的居民时常会与人类之敌发生小规模冲突，大家都已经习以为常。但最近，那群可恶的孽畜似乎已经完全失去了控制。我们从那些穿过亚空间，抵达达戈努斯的船上收到了报告。他们说他们的船只，以及出发时的殖民地都遭到了袭击。我们已经确认了袭击人类的异形种类。他们是{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}黑暗灵族{/g}，是人类古老而又邪恶的敌人。您在旅行的过程中一定要保持警惕，如果异形发现情况对他们有利，他们肯定会袭击行商浪人的舰船。”
languages.original_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

traits.locale_text: “这个星系的居民时常会与人类之敌发生小规模冲突，大家都已经习以为常。但最近，那群可恶的孽畜似乎已经完全失去了控制。我们从那些穿过亚空间，抵达达戈努斯的船上收到了报告。他们说他们的船只，以及出发时的殖民地都遭到了袭击。我们已经确认了袭击人类的异形种类。他们是艾达灵族，是人类古老而又邪恶的敌人。您在旅行的过程中一定要保持警惕，如果异形发现情况对他们有利，他们肯定会袭击行商浪人的舰船。”

languages.text: «Los residentes de los sistemas locales han superado numerosas escaramuzas con los enemigos de la Humanidad. Sin embargo, recientemente esas bestias inmundas parecen estar completamente descontroladas. Nos llegan informes de naves que han atravesado la disformidad para venir a Dargonus: tanto las naves como las colonias de las que provienen han sido atacadas. Hemos identificado a los xenos responsables: los {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, los antiguos enemigos de la humanidad. Tenga cuidado en sus viajes, ya que los xenos no dudarán en atacar la nave de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente si creen que la situación les favorece».
languages.original_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

traits.locale_text: «Los residentes de los sistemas locales han superado numerosas escaramuzas con los enemigos de la Humanidad. Sin embargo, recientemente esas bestias inmundas parecen estar completamente descontroladas. Nos llegan informes de naves que han atravesado la disformidad para venir a Dargonus: tanto las naves como las colonias de las que provienen han sido atacadas. Hemos identificado a los xenos responsables: los Aeldari, los antiguos enemigos de la humanidad. Tenga cuidado en sus viajes, ya que los xenos no dudarán en atacar la nave de un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente si creen que la situación les favorece».

languages.text: 「ローカルシステムの住民は、人類の敵と小競り合いを繰り広げるなんて珍しいことにはなりません。ですが、最近は忌まわしい獣たちが己の理性を完全に失うことがあるようです。私達はダルゴナスへ続く〈歪み〉を抜けた船から報告を受けています――乗務員も、その出身コロニーも襲撃を受けていると。私達は今回の脅威となる異種族の種類を突き止めたところ――{g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}デュカーリ{/g}でした。古来より人類と敵対する狡猾な奴らです。陛下もご用心ください――異種族は間違いなく、自由開拓者の船を襲います。奴らに好都合な環境という認識があるのでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

traits.locale_text: 「ローカルシステムの住民は、人類の敵と小競り合いを繰り広げるなんて珍しいことにはなりません。ですが、最近は忌まわしい獣たちが己の理性を完全に失うことがあるようです。私達はダルゴナスへ続く〈歪み〉を抜けた船から報告を受けています――乗務員も、その出身コロニーも襲撃を受けていると。私達は今回の脅威となる異種族の種類を突き止めたところ――アエルダリでした。古来より人類と敵対する狡猾な奴らです。陛下もご用心ください――異種族は間違いなく、自由開拓者の船を襲います。奴らに好都合な環境という認識があるのでしょう」

languages.text: "Die Bewohner der lokalen Systeme sind vertraut mit Gefechten gegen Feinde der Menschheit. Aber in letzter Zeit scheinen die verabscheuungswürdigen Bestien komplett verrückt geworden zu sein. Wir erhalten Berichte von Schiffen, die es durch den Warp nach Dargonus geschafft haben – sowohl sie als auch die Kolonien, von denen sie kommen, wurden angegriffen. "Wir haben die Xenos-Art identifiziert, die hinter dieser Bedrohung steckt – die {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, alte und heimtückische Gegner der Menschheit." Seid wachsam auf Euren Reisen – die Xenos werden zweifellos das Schiff {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} angreifen, wenn die Umstände zu ihren Gunsten sind."
languages.original_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bewohner der lokalen Systeme sind vertraut mit Gefechten gegen Feinde der Menschheit. Aber in letzter Zeit scheinen die verabscheuungswürdigen Bestien komplett verrückt geworden zu sein. Wir erhalten Berichte von Schiffen, die es durch den Warp nach Dargonus geschafft haben – sowohl sie als auch die Kolonien, von denen sie kommen, wurden angegriffen. Wir haben die Xenos-Art identifiziert, die hinter dieser Bedrohung steckt – die Aeldari, alte und heimtückische Gegner der Menschheit. Seid wachsam auf Euren Reisen – die Xenos werden zweifellos das Schiff {mf|eines Freihändlers|einer Freihändlerin} angreifen, wenn die Umstände zu ihren Gunsten sind."

languages.text: « Les habitants des systèmes locaux ont l'habitude des escarmouches avec les ennemis de l'humanité, mais ces derniers temps, ces maudites créatures semblent décupler leurs efforts. Elles attaquent aussi bien les colonies que les vaisseaux en transit, d'après les rapports de ceux qui parviennent à traverser le Warp et rejoindre Dargonus. Nous avons identifié l'espèce de xénos en question : il s'agit des {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukharis{/g}, un ennemi de l'humanité aussi ancien que sournois. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente} lors de vos voyages. Les xénos n'hésiteront pas à s'en prendre au vaisseau d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} si les circonstances le leur permettent. »
languages.original_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

traits.locale_text: « Les habitants des systèmes locaux ont l'habitude des escarmouches avec les ennemis de l'humanité, mais ces derniers temps, ces maudites créatures semblent décupler leurs efforts. Elles attaquent aussi bien les colonies que les vaisseaux en transit, d'après les rapports de ceux qui parviennent à traverser le Warp et rejoindre Dargonus. Nous avons identifié l'espèce de xénos en question : il s'agit des Aeldaris, un ennemi de l'humanité aussi ancien que sournois. Soyez {mf|prudent|prudente} lors de vos voyages. Les xénos n'hésiteront pas à s'en prendre au vaisseau d'{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} si les circonstances le leur permettent. »

languages.text: "Yerel sistemlerde yaşayanlar, İnsanlığın düşmanlarıyla çatışmaya alışık olsa da bu menfur yaratıklara son zamanlarda bir hâller oldu, iyice delirdiler. Öteboyuttan Dargonus'a ulaşan gemilerin raporlarına göre hem kendileri hem de ayrıldıkları koloniler saldırıya uğruyormuş. Bu tehlikenin kaynağı olan zeno türünü, İnsanlığın kadim ve sinsi düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhariler{/g} olarak tanımladılar. Seyahatleriniz sırasında dikkatli olun. Zenolar, avantaj sahibi olduklarını düşündükleri takdirde bir Hür Tacir'in gemisine saldırmaktan asla çekinmez."
languages.original_text: "The residents of the local systems are no strangers to skirmishes with enemies of Humanity. But recently the loathsome beasts seem to have completely flown off the handle. We're receiving reports from ships that made it through the warp to Dargonus — both they and the colonies that they departed from are being attacked. We have identified the breed of xenos that pose this threat — the {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}, Humanity's ancient and insidious foes. Be vigilant on your travels — the xenos will undoubtedly attack a Rogue Trader's ship should they find the circumstances to be in their favour."

traits.locale_text: "Yerel sistemlerde yaşayanlar İnsanlığın düşmanlarıyla çatışmaya alışıktır ancak son zamanlarda bu menfur yaratıklar tamamen çılgına dönmüş gibiler. Öteboyuttan Dargonus'a ulaşan gemilerden aldığımız raporlara göre hem onlar hem de ayrıldıkları koloniler saldırıya uğruyorlar. Bu tehlikenin kaynağı zeno türünü de tanımladılar: İnsanlığın kadim ve sinsi düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:Drukhari}Drukhari{/g}. Seyahatleriniz sırasında dikkatli olun, zenolar avantaj sahibi olduklarını düşündükleri takdirde bir Hür Tacir'in gemisine saldırmaktan kesinlikle çekinmezler."
